title: Dave Reardon: Numatas keep good vibes flowing for late son
author: Dave Reardon
excerpt: The Chace Numata Senior All-Star Classic drew more than 600, including some scouts, to Les Murakami Stadium. The game showcased the talents of nearly 50 standouts from schools statewide.

title: New Hawaii AD Matt Elliott faces early challenges
author: Stephen Tsai
excerpt: In a rat-a-tat first week as the University of Hawaiiâ€™s athletic director, Matt Elliott met with staff, coaches, athletes and boosters; analyzed reports and data, and acted on day-to-day matters.
